eventName: Ideal City: Carnival in the Endless Summer
storyInfo: The new arrivals at the Great Aquapit formally earn the acceptance of the Durin people after their referendum, and they enjoy a good time with the design representative. Gavial and Eunectes find a guide to help them go underground.

attributes.content: There's this one proverb Blaze always pulls out. How did it go again––?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: The shortest distance between two points is a straight line.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: That's the one.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I have a conjecture. You rainforest folk have the terrible misfortune of living in that dump, so you've been compensated with extremely good luck in other areas.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: What other explanation is there for why the lot of you haven't gone extinct yet? It doesn't make any sense.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: It proves our way of life is good for keeping us alive.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: High Priest, what are Durin cities like?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Uhh, I don't remember. A little too boring to talk about.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: I spent some time in the underground world a century or so ago and the only thing I can remember is that it was a nasty place chock-full of imbeciles.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Less interesting than watching Originium slugs sleep by the river.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Though, heh, you young kids ought to experience things on your own. You need to have the kind of drive and ambition that I did!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: By the way, turn left at the next junction, and DON'T jump down!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: How much longer now, High Priest?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Good question. There's no end to the road called life. No matter how far you've come, you can only keep moving forward— plus, there's a geezer like me watching over you.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Oh, if you meant how far we are from the city, if you could drop right through the rocks like I can, you need to go down another five or six hundred meters.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Zumama, how the hell did you put up with this guy up so long? He won't shut up.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: He's usually not as noisy around the machines.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Does this chainsaw blade count as a machine?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Harrumph! No manners!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Would you look at that. Worked like a charm.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: This is it... We're here!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Uhh, the 'Great Aquapit?'
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Let's set aside the Durins' naming sense for now.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: This waterpark already looked pretty insane from the distance, but it's even more incredible up-close!
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Is this how Durins live all the time?!
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Cowabunga!!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: When did he change into a swimsuit?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: E-Elysium, please be careful!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Woah, that was a close one! Are you alright? Didn't spill your drink, did you?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Well... that's weird. How'd you surface-dwellers end up down here? Never seen you people around before.
attributes.name: Durin Youth

attributes.content: And this guy looks about as stupid as a Durin.
attributes.name: Durin Youth

attributes.content: Hello, sir. We were invited here by Stitch Canvas.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: He said, uh, he wanted us to help him with a little favor!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Stitch Canvas, huh... Would you look at that, he actually came back.
attributes.name: Durin Youth

attributes.content: I thought he was going to say goodbye to this city for good, just like that respectable teacher of his.
attributes.name: Durin Youth

attributes.content: As much as I'd like to offer you our famous Durin hospitality, welcoming folk that we are, I sadly can't while Stitch is running around causing havoc and ignoring all our ways.
attributes.name: Durin Youth

attributes.content: Let me introduce myself first. I am Catch Lightrace, this city's design representative.
attributes.name: Durin Youth

attributes.content: No need to be nervous. It'll be over in no time.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: What... is the meaning of this?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Hmm? Did the atmosphere just get a little weird all of a sudden? I can't handle all these people trying to toast me at the same time.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Are you guys...?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Trying to pick a fight?! I'm not afraid of you shorties!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: You're gonna get a taste of the combat skills Gavial taught me! Phew... Take a sturdy stance, and put your hips into it!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Come at me!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Wh-What is she doing?! Is she gonna clobber us with her stick?
attributes.name: Flustered Durin

attributes.content: Gyaaaah! Stay away from me!
attributes.name: Nervous Durin

attributes.content: Hey, hey! What are you people doing?! Stop! Stop, I tell you!!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Huh? I thought we were going to fight?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Why would Durins do such a pointless thing?!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Put your weapons away and come with me!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Ahem! Citizens of Zeruertza, this is this quarter's four hundred and seventeenth referendum.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Following our previous vote on this month's general background music, we decided on the color of our street lights for the week during the last referendum. Now, we must answer a new question.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Since this question isn't particularly important, the individuals here today are enough of a quorum to represent Zeruertza.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Today's question is: Zeruertza has just welcomed new guests. Should we accept them or not?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: What guests?
attributes.name: Topsy-Turvy Durin

attributes.content: I heard something about a guy who doesn't drink?
attributes.name: Topsy-Turvy Durin

attributes.content: Ah, no, it's these ones standing right in front of us.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Cheers, brother! Isn't it crazy that there's a Durin out there who doesn't drink?
attributes.name: Topsy-Turvy Durin

attributes.content: Yeah, that's totally crazy. Cheers!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Let's finish chugging this barrel, then we can go play in the water.
attributes.name: Topsy-Turvy Durin

attributes.content: Hah, make sure to keep those eyelids peeled! You have to see what us surface-dwellers can do!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Tomimi, sorry if I sound like a broken record, but are you sure everything's alright at Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Uh, p-probably?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: You're always welcome to come back if things aren't working out. Be careful— don't underestimate the amount of damage a bad environment can do to you!
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Hurry it up, Catch! We've got a lot of stuff to take care of!
attributes.name: Topsy-Turvy Durin

attributes.content: Brother, have you ever heard of a sport called surfing?
attributes.name: Topsy-Turvy Durin

attributes.content: Surfing, you say? That might as well be my middle name!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Objection!
This guy can't be trusted!
Ah, yeah. I knew things weren't going to be that simple...
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Hey you, drunk Liberi over there!
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: Inam, they must be talking to you, because I certainly amn't drunk. Not a bit.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I AM talking to you, guy with the stein!
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: Alright. Whaddya want?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: You'd better come out and pick a side: noble mead, or lame-ass whiskey!
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: We of the Old Karl Mead fan club graciously welcomed you into our fold, and now you're hanging out with those hoity-toity whiskey-sippers? My disappointment is immeasurable!
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: Not too long ago, we had our arms over each other's shoulders, shouting 'Long Live Mead' together. But I turn around for a second and you go off to play with those uppity kids?
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: Err, um, I think they're both great...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Oh no you don't! We don't take kindly to fence-sitters around here!
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: Haha, you're a joke. You can't know what's good and what's bad without a point of reference. Isn't that right, brother?
attributes.name: Topsy-Turvy Durin

attributes.content: There's nothing to be afraid of. Speak your mind, and let the words of praise flow for our great whiskey. That is, if you want to stay in Zeruertza––
attributes.name: Topsy-Turvy Durin

attributes.content: Hey, stop threatening him, you despicable whiskey-sipper!
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: Gah. Your mead's baby stuff! Might as well drink it out of a bottle!
attributes.name: Topsy-Turvy Durin

attributes.content: Let's throw down in front of the Big Cask tonight then! Walk the walk if you talk the talk!
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: Hah, you wanna see who can chug more of your baby brew? You have my attention!
attributes.name: Topsy-Turvy Durin

attributes.content: Wait, stop right there! The referenda we hold here in the forum are sacred! Talk about drinking somewhere else––
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Raise your hand, and let your vote be known. The minority obeys the will of the majority— that is the eternal lodestar of Zeruertza.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Begin the counting of the votes!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: If you're raising your hand, then I'm not!
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: I'm raising my hand whether you like it or not! Piss off!
attributes.name: Topsy-Turvy Durin

attributes.content: Just wait 'til we get to the water slide. I'm gonna splash your brains out!
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: With what, that ridiculous 'technique' of yours?
attributes.name: Topsy-Turvy Durin

attributes.content: Alright, not bad. A solemnly conducted vote.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: In what world does this count as solemn?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: The votes have been counted, and the results are clear.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: The people of Zeruertza have made their decision: play to your hearts' content, surface-dwellers.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Cheers!!
attributes.name: Durin Attendees

attributes.content: By the way, I welcome you as an architect. That gorgeous edifice sitting atop the lake is my pride and joy. You are welcome to play your hearts out beneath it.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: You're talking about that 'Great Aquapit' over there?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I didn't come up with the name. It was something we all voted on!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Did they tack more stuff onto the 'Great Aquapit?' It looks even more hideous than the last time I saw it.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: That's Catch's masterpiece, you know? You really shouldn't badmouth it in front of him.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: He's not worthy of my constructive criticism anyway. Or rather, there's no way to fix it in the first place!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: That malformed, twisted structure... Just looking at it makes me want to pass out! How can the people of Zeruertza continue to suffer him as the design representative?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Probably because folks really love playing on the big slide.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: If I were calling the shots...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: You'd use béton brute to construct... uh, an array of squares.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: You still don't know me well enough, Edge. I'd just put a long, narrow strip of concrete there. Minimalism is beauty.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Huh? What about the slide then?
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: I suppose there wouldn't be any harm in slanting it a little...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Ahem, back to the issue at hand.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: There don't seem to be any major issues with the dome right now, but I'm still worried.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Since the earthquake over six months ago, the leak that sprung in the dome has been getting worse and worse. Is that your idea of no major issues?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I'm just telling you what the people of Zeruertza think. The water flow increased? Makes for a more stimulating experience. The temperature control stopped working? Even better, that just means the summer's not over yet!
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: As for the Originium detection system... Well, no active Originium layers have been detected near Zeruertza for over two decades!
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Hmph. A short-sighted bunch.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: So, you...
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: I'm not fixing it. What's worth saving about this cheap, rickety dome? I've said it a million times.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Were you not looking for a solution when you first went up to the surface? Were you not thinking about ways to restore the dome?
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Absolutely not. I was just trying to hide from you because you won't shut up.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Now that's a little harsh, isn't it? Just a few months ago, I was voted into the Top 100 List of Zeruertza's Nicest Elders.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Alright, enough of that. I know you're concerned about the state of the dome.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: But if Catch can't even solve the issue with the dome's integrity, then forget occupying the design representative's seat, he should get the hell out of Zeruertza.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: If we're just talking outcomes, there shouldn't be any safety concerns regarding the dome at this point.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: We can leave the temperature control system alone, since our beloved citizens are having a good time anyway. After they get tired of it, maybe they'll raise their hands and decide to turn Zeruertza into a walk-in freezer.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: As for that Originium detection system, if you ask me, it was never that reliable to begin with. But since you've been chasing me around everywhere, I assume that's what you're most worried about? I do have a plan for that actually.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: It'd be better for us to rebuild the railway bridge that was damaged by the earthquake, re-excavate the collapsed tunnels, and directly install the Originium detection instruments there for more accurate readings.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: From the very beginning, the dome was over-engineered to try to do too many things at once.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: You'd rather take a massive detour like that than directly work on the dome? Look, even if Finch up and left without saying anything, that's still your work together, master and pupil...
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: We're done here, okay?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Stop before I actually get mad, Edge.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: ...Fine.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Right now, the problem of Originium detection takes top priority.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: I picked up a few people up on the surface who will probably come in handy. Their hodgepodge of skills is likely enough to repair Zeruertza's railway.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Now, we only need to...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Pardon the interruption, but are those handy people from the surface you're talking about...
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Is that one flying through the sky right now?
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Waheyyyyy!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: When you, Zumama, and Kemar first joined Rhodes Island, I didn't think much of it. But now that I've seen this guy...
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Be honest with me, Tomimi. Is it really that easy to swindle a paycheck out of your company?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Elysium is actually a skilled guide and a communications specialist...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Well, anyway! Maybe this is who he really is!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Here's the sweet fruit wine you wanted~
attributes.name: Durin Hawker

attributes.content: Thank you!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Uhh, how should I pay? Or rather, how'd you buy all that other stuff before?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I told the nice tailor granny a few stories about Gavial, and she was so happy she gave me these clothes for free!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: As for me... The drinks were covered by my good friends from the fan club, and I put the food on Stitch's tab.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I guess you'll probably survive, no matter where you get tossed.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: That's one of the qualities of a professional guide!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Ma'am, go ahead and put our drinks on Mr. Stitch's tab as well. He won't mind.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: You got it!
attributes.name: Durin Hawker

attributes.content: Haha, that guy's stingier than you'd think. Here, let me pay for those drinks.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: I am quite proud of this amusement park after all. Naturally, I hope you'll have a great time.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Mr. Lightrace, do you and Mr. Canvas know each other well?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Depends what you mean by 'well.'
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: When we were young, we ran into each other a lot, since we were competing. We've gone head-to-head over several projects, some of which I won, some of which he won.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: The only project neither one of us could secure was this dome above our heads.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: We both have ideas for how we'd like to improve Zeruertza's iconic dome, and for a few years, we practically met every day––
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: During the referendum meetings, we both worked hard to prove that our respective ideas for the dome renovation were better.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: But in the end, neither of us managed to win over a majority of Zeruertza's population.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: After all, the dome is the legacy of Master Finch, the design representative who came before me.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: And Stitch, as his student, is also...
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Forget it. There are some things I'm not meant to say. You'd be better off asking him yourself.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Catch, my dear bro, why is someone as young as you talking like a withered old man? 'When we were young?' Come on.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Just follow Elysium's lead. Keep your heart pure, and face life with a smile! Instead of lamenting days bygone, come enjoy a drink with us––
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Liberi man, your extra-large barrel of ice-cold beat-the-heat ale is here!
attributes.name: Durin Hawker

attributes.content: Help yourselves, everyone! Our good friend Catch wants us to have a good time, so how could we possibly disappoint his expectations?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: So, my good brother, mind if I order some more? The folks from the fan club aren't paying for other drinks, and there's still so much I want to try.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Are you sure you're not a Durin on stilts?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace
Contemplative Lupo
attributes.content: Are there any other ads I have to write..?

attributes.name: Contemplative Lupo
attributes.content: Oh, right.
attributes.joined: Are there any other ads I have to write..?Oh, right.

attributes.content: 'How should I describe the feeling of this long-leaf dew rolling down my throat? How ought I praise it without using words so pedestrian?'
attributes.name: Contemplative Lupo

attributes.content: 'Tis as if I could swallow a cloud, or pluck a string of spring rain's pearls.'
attributes.name: Contemplative Lupo

attributes.content: 'Tis as if I could feel the falling of winter's last two snowflakes...'
attributes.name: Contemplative Lupo

attributes.content: Uhh, they probably have no idea what falling snowflakes are, so maybe I'll go with a more Durin metaphor.
attributes.name: Contemplative Lupo

attributes.content: 'Two super-frosty fruit-flavored ice cubes fall into a marvelous explosion of flavor––'
attributes.name: Contemplative Lupo

attributes.content: Ugh, that hurts––
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: The High Priest was right, we really shouldn't have jumped down.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: It's been a real long time since I've felt like my bones were gonna fall apart. Probably the last time we fought.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Yeah. Now I think I'm starting to hallucinate. About fruit-flavored ice cubes and rum. Think it might be an aftereffect of our fall?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Huh? Why's there a Lupo sleeping here?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Do you think... this might be our fault?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Probably not... right? Uhh, think I should treat her?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Did you bring your medical kit?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit once said that a true master of medicine can resolve most problems with her bare hands.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Did she now?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Well, I don't remember her exact words, but that's the gist I took from it. Alright, where to start...?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: *gasp*!
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: Oh, she's awake. I haven't even gotten started yet.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Um... Are you alright?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Ugh, my head's still spinning...
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: Sorry, I think the two of us might've bumped into you earlier. Need me to inspect you?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: Come again...?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: How did you two find this place?
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: Mind if we ask for directions? Do you know if there's a magical underground city here, or something like that?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You came from the surface.
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: Weird thing to say. You didn't?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: We heard something terrible was about to happen underground, so...
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: You've finally come, surface-dwellers.
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: 'Naturally, those who come with chainsaw and axe in hand can only spell calamity for this pure garden.'
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: ...... 'The beast of civilization finally sheds all pretense of hiding its razor-sharp fangs, baring its gigantic maw before us...'
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: I see, that makes sense. A wild beast with a huge mouth and razor-sharp teeth. Don't worry, I'll handle this.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Huh? No, that was a rhetorical flourish...
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: As long as the thing's less than ten meters wide, I'm confident I can take it down clean. Perfect timing too, since I've been itching to get a good workout!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Mind showing us the way, Miss Lupo? Is it over here?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Maybe it'll be faster if we keep jumping down.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Stop, surface-dwellers! The blood on you will...
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: Don't worry. I know how to control my strength so it's not going to splatter all over the place.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Zumama, ready for round two?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Right behind you.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Hold on tight, Miss Lupo.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You can trust Gavial. She's an expert when it comes to fighting.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Uh, actually, there's another way... Hey? Hey!!
attributes.name: Lupo
